\subsection{Detailed Description}
Exception inheriting from \hyperlink{classutils_1_1slightcsv__error}{slightcsv\+\_\+error}. It is thrown when\+:
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item data query methods are called before loading a data structure 
\end{DoxyItemize}
